name: Cat Wiki
description: An application where you can search for cat images and information about breeds.

name: FinnApp
description: A simple application that helps you to control your expenses. You cand add, modify and delete an operation, see the total cash available and search in the history. App made as challenge from Alkemy. I also added features like autentication with Google, token sent in cookie, refresh jwt and statistics with charts.

name: Plus Hardware eâ€‘commerce
description: E-commerce made for hardware products. It has the Mercadopago payment method, hierarchy and restriction by user role (buyer, seller, admin), geolocation for sucursal, Auth with Google, Wishlits, reviews and purchase orders by user and mailing system. This was a grupal project where I was responsible for the auth with Google, part of the geolocaton system, hierarchy and restriction by user role and the design.

name: Country App
description: A SPA where you can search and filter different countries, see their information and create different toristic activities for each one. This was my second project where I learned how to use PostgreSQL.

name: Wheater App
description: A simple page that allows you to search different countries and their respective climate information. This was my first app where I learned to call an API.
